linkedConnectors_subtitle: Connect your Radix Wallet to desktop web browsers by linking to the Radix Connector browser extension. Here are your linked Connectors.
linkedConnectors_newConnection_subtitle: Scan the QR code shown in the Radix Connector browser extension
linkedConnectors_nameNewConnector_subtit: What would you like to call this Connector?
linkedConnectors_nameNewConnector_textFi: Name this connector e.g. ‘Chrome on MacBook Pro’
linkedConnectors_removeConnectionAlert_m: You will no longer be able to connect your wallet to this device and browser combination.
linkedConnectors_cameraPermissionDeniedA: Camera access is required to link to a Connector.
linkedConnectors_localNetworkPermissionD: Local network access is required to link to a Connector.
